getAuditAssignment(uint256).details: raises an exception if the audit is not assigned

params.auditId: functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId

returns._0: AuditAssignmentData - Struct with the Audit Assignment Information

insertAuditAssignment(uint256,address[]).details: The (DAudit) uses this method to assign the result of the assignment processes

params._auditors: array of auditors to be assigned to the audit item
params.auditId: functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId

isAuditAssigned(uint256).details: Used to check as required for certain functios assuming there is and audit struct already in place

params.auditId: functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId

returns._0: true if the audit has assignments, otherwise returns false

params.auditId: functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId to be checked for assignemnt
params.auditor: address of the auditor to check the assignemnt

returns._0: true if the auditor is assigned to the audit item, false if no assigned to the audit item.

params.auditId: functional key of the AuditItem tokenId = auditId to be checked for assignemnt
params.auditResultId: functional key of the AuditResult with the results evidence submitted by the auditor (AuditResult tokenId)
params.auditor: address of the auditor submitting the results
params.auditorResult: boolean value indicating if the auditor indicated the audit results to Passed (true) or Failed (false)

returns.success: = true if the auditor is assigned to the audit item, false if no assigned to the audit item.

updatePayments(uint256,uint256[],bool[]).details: arrays must be in the same order of the addresses submitted when the audit was assigned

params.auditId: functional key of the AuditItem tokenId = auditId to update the payments information
params.auditorFeePaid: - array with boolean values indicating the fee was paid to the auditor or not.
params.auditorFees: - array with the fee paid to each auditor

getAuditAssignment(uint256).notice: Returns and auditor assignments information from a given audit item.

insertAuditAssignment(uint256,address[]).notice: Adds a set of auditors to a given audit item

isAuditAssigned(uint256).notice: Finds if the system has assignments registered for the audit

isAuditorAssigned(uint256,address).notice: Returns true if the auditor (address) is assigned to a given audit Item.

updateAuditResult(uint256,uint256,addres.notice: Saves the audit results submitted by the auditor and associate the information to the audit item assignment.

updatePayments(uint256,uint256[],bool[]).notice: Updates the payments done to an Audit Item.
